title: How to Create Motion in Little Alchemy 2: Recipe & Guide

steps.title: Combine Science, Philosophy, or Idea with various motion-related elements.
steps.content: Combine Science, Philosophy, or Idea with various motion-related elements. There are a number of ways that you can create the Motion element in Little Alchemy 2 using a combination of Science, Philosophy, Idea, and a few motion-related elements. [1] X Research source Science & Wind , Tornado , Stream , or River Science is unlocked by combining Human with Telescope, Microscope, or Universe. Wind is created by combining Air and Pressure. Tornado is made by combining Storm with Storm or Wind. You can also create it by combining Wind with Wind or Big. Stream is made by combining Rivulet with Big or River with Small . River is made by combining Stream with Big, Water with Mountain, and Rain with Mountain or Hill. Philosophy & Wind , Tornado , Stream , or River Philosophy is created by combining Human with Story or Idea, or Chicken with Egg. Idea & Wind Idea is unlocked by many combinations. Most of these combinations include combining two of a profession, but you can also get it by combining Human & Light Bulb, Light Bulb & Science, or Philosophy & Science.

steps.title: Using Time.
steps.content: Using Time. Time is an element that you unlock after unlocking 100 other elements. You can use Time while creating Motion in the path listed below [2] X Research source : Air + Air = Pressure Air + Pressure = Wind Water + Earth = Mud Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Primordial Soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Glass + Planet = Telescope Human + Telescope = Science Science + Wind = Motion

steps.title: Without using Time.
steps.content: Without using Time. If you don't have Time unlocked, you can still make Motion. The path will just be slightly different, as listed below [3] X Research source : Air + Air = Pressure Air + Pressure = Wind Water + Earth = Mud Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial Soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Glass + Planet = Telescope Human + Telescope = Science Science + Wind = Motion

steps.title: Motion is used in many recipes.
steps.content: Motion is used in many recipes. These recipes usually involve the concept of motion somehow, either because they are moving themselves or they are created by motion. [4] X Research source Blender : Blade + Motion Butter : Milk + Motion Chainsaw : Axe + Motion Current : Ocean or Sea + Motion Earthquake : Earth or Continent + Motion Electricity : Wind Turbine + Motion Lawn Mower : Scythe + Motion River : Lake + Motion Rivulet : Puddle + Motion Sandstorm : Sand or Desert + Motion Stream : Pond + Motion Tornado : Storm or Wind + Motion Wheel : Tool, Stone, Metal, or Steel + Motion Wind : Air or Atmosphere + Motion
